entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
